title: Tule Lake Unit: Plan Your Visit
body: Plan Your Visit         Visitor Center Sign   Basic Information Whether you have thirty minutes or all day, start planning your visit here.        Inside of the Tule Lake Visitor Center   Operating Hours & Seasons Find out when the visitor center is opened, and staffed. The only way to tour the buildings at Tule Lake is with a ranger. Find out when tours are and how to set up a tour.         Directions & Transportation Not sure how to get here? Visit the directions page to find out.         Teachers, Plan a Field Trip From elementary to college, all grades can take something away from the stories at Tule Lake. Find out how to arrange your class's visit and what opportunities and materials are available.
